Former First Lady, MIchelle Obama - what a treat to hear her speak today at Learning 2017. Authentic, smart, kind and a tremendous representative for our nation. My favorite quote from her today...
"The presidency doesn't change who you are, it reveals who you are."
recommendations: Gail Gust-Militello
Marketing Strategist Driving Results for Businesses; Owner at Uncharted Marketing Services, LLC
November 21, 2015, Gail reported directly to Ric

“An extraordinary leader and innovator” is how I would best describe Ric in a few words. I had the honor of experiencing Ric’s leadership first-hand in my role at SkyTouch, where he showed genuine commitment to the company’s vision and to the team. Under Ric’s leadership, SkyTouch entered the marketplace and quickly gained national recognition for innovation and was named one of the “top 20 most promising solution providers” in the hospitality space. Ric possesses an uncanny ability to recognize the needs of the organization and clearly communicate with a quiet confidence. He is passionate about culture and always instilled positive energy, personally engaging with team members at all levels in the organization. He places trust in his team and challenges individuals to stretch themselves, maximizing productivity and achieving measurable results. Ric was intentional about creating opportunities for the team to be rewarded and was always the life of our company events! Working with Ric was a privilege and a boon to my professional development. He truly exemplifies one of his favorite quotes: “leadership is action, not position,” and any organization he leads will benefit from his outstanding character and unique abilities.
Gail Gust-Militello

Michelle Tessendorf
CEO at Orchard: Africa
January 28, 2015, Ric was senior to Michelle but didn’t manage directly

Ric serves on the Board of Orchard: Africa.  He is a valuable member of this team.  Many of the issues we address are complex, yet Ric has this ability to find the simplicity in the complexity.  Ric is a strategic thinker through and through. He grasps issues quickly and can find solutions that are practical and effective.  Ric expresses himself with clarity, authority and insightfulness.  He leads strongly yet always shows concern for others in his leading.  Ric has a  cheerful and optimistic disposition which encourages and strengthens those around him. I have been particularly impressed with Ric's ability to work and interact effectively in different cultural settings, a trait appreciated in our organisation.  I wholeheartedly recommend Ric.

Joseph Papa
Goal-oriented Senior Manager with 20+ Years of Operational Leadership Experience
January 27, 2015, Ric was senior to Joseph but didn’t manage directly

Peter F. Drucker, in The Practice of Management, said, "Channel your energies into building on strength, not into remedying weaknesses. Give people freedom and responsibility within the context of well-defined objectives; enable your people to work! Authority must be grounded in competence, not in position or status.”  Indeed this describes Ric’s Leadership.  As a Leader he creates a cadence of productivity that is results driven with not only attention to detail but also defined by a heightened sense of urgency and accountability.  He is a decisive, optimistic and inclusive Leader who values and promotes collaboration and communication.  Lastly he has that rare Leadership ability of creating a clear vision and obtaining team commitment while maintaining energized focus and engagement.  He is persistent and relentless in driving his team toward excellence – a trait that makes everyone better.

Christine Tan
Senior Vice President - Strategic Sales and Account Management at FASTBOOKING
July 18, 2012, Ric was senior to Christine but didn’t manage directly

I worked with Ric during my tenure at Pegasus Solutions as VP Sales and Account Management Asia Pacific.  As a direct report, he encourages you to constantly challenge yourself to reach your true potential.  He was very supportive of his team and makes great efforts to engage team members in different countries and to understand the cultural differences. He took time to travel all over Asia Pacific with the team so he could personally hear from the customers and connect with them.  Ric also demonstrated a vast knowledge of the travel industry from both a sales and marketing perspective. He was excellent in creating PR opportunities and helped enhanced our company’s profile in the market. I have enjoyed knowing Ric as a friend and as a supervisor and wouldn’t hesitate to recommend him to an organization seeking a strong and experienced professional.

Todd Arviso
Vice President Revenue Management Americas at Hilton Worldwide
July 10, 2012, Ric worked with Todd in the same group

Starting a new company and bringing it to market is overwhelming.  While there are thousands of books and online resources available, none have matched the impact from my personal interactions with Ric.  He has tremendous vision, passion, expertise, and a genuine interest in our success.  Our Board of Directors and investors were thankful that we were able to engage Ric to transfer his expertise and past experiences into my personal development as a new CEO.Ric is thoughtful, strategic, and insightful.  In addition to his involvement with my personal development, our team has benefited from his investment of time and his leadership in the strategic development of our company's business.I am thankful to have Ric as both a mentor and a great friend, and can now see first hand how he would positively impact any organization that he is involved with.  If you company is searching for a thought leader who is strategic, passionate, and wants to achieve greatness, I recommend hiring Ric.

May 18, 2016, Ric managed Michael directly

Michael is a talented, passionate leader who effortlessly blends his tremendously strong technical background with his charismatic style of leadership.   His dedication is unparalleled - both to the organization and to the members of his team.  Simply put, he is a joy to work with and a tremendous asset.Michael is a great thought partner who is willing to challenge ideas and plans that he feels are not in the best interest of the organization. He is also willing to give everything he has to achieve organizational goals.  I'm not sure I ever met someone who worked harder than Michael.  More importantly to me, he is a tremendously smart worker.  He invests time and energy into systems and processes that ensure that the organization is working efficiently and effectively - making the most of available resources.I would enthusiastically welcome the opportunity to work with Michael again.

summary: Board director with global experience in public companies, start-ups, new business entities, PE firms and nonprofits.  Proven success in developing new business models to address the need for re-invention and diversification.  Effective in breaking cycles that hold organizations and teams from reaching their full potential.  Understands how to create a culture of innovation and provide leadership strategies for growth. Areas of proven excellence include:  Focused Innovation 	                   Strategic Planning & ImplementationLeadership Development.               Balancing Company Resources Building Corporate Culture.            Mergers & AcquisitionsMaximize Shareholder Value.         Business Development                       Corporate Social Responsibility     Board- CEO RelationsProduct Evolution Planning              Revenue Growth      Public Speaking                                     Global Operations, Sales & SupportStart Up Leadership                              Non-Profit Leadership
